entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 10:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
